items.content_html: Slick est un framework NodeJS léger et performant permettant la création de Single Page Applications avec Server Side Rendering.
items.title: 8borane8/slick: Slick est un framework NodeJS léger et performant permettant la création de Single Page Applications avec Server Side Rendering.

items.content_html: LazyLoad is a lightweight, flexible script that speeds up your website by deferring the loading of your below-the-fold images, backgrounds, videos, iframes and scripts to when they will enter the viewport. Written in plain "vanilla" JavaScript, it leverages IntersectionObserver, supports responsive images and enables native lazy loading.
items.title: verlok/vanilla-lazyload: LazyLoad is a lightweight, flexible script that speeds up your website by deferring the loading of your below-the-fold images, backgrounds, videos, iframes and scripts to when they will enter the viewport. Written in plain "vanilla" JavaScript, it leverages IntersectionObserver, supports responsive images and enables native lazy loading.

items.content_html: Urlynk is a lightweight URL shortener built with Node.js and MongoDB. This project aims to provide users with a fast and easy way to shorten long URLs into concise, shareable links. With Urlynk, you can generate shortened URLs with just a few clicks, making it convenient for sharing links on social media, emails, or any other platform.
items.title: ctrly4sh/Urlynk-url-shortner: Urlynk is a lightweight URL shortener built with Node.js and MongoDB. This project aims to provide users with a fast and easy way to shorten long URLs into concise, shareable links. With Urlynk, you can generate shortened URLs with just a few clicks, making it convenient for sharing links on social media, emails, or any other platform.
